title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Math Problem-Solving Skills Through Question-Generation Strategies During Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more exploratory questions that deepen conceptual understanding and application when analyzing math problems linked to real-world work scenarios.
Learners can provide two or more rounds of feedback to improve peers' math problem-solving processes based on their questions.
Learners can compile generated questions and systematically organize problem-solving strategies into a project report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
